alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 10:09PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT NASSAU...BRADFORD...NORTHEASTERN ALACHUA...CENTRAL ST. JOHNS...NORTHEASTERN MARION...SOUTHEASTERN BAKER...PUTNAM...CLAY...DUVAL...EASTERN CAMDEN AND CENTRAL GLYNN COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 PM EST... At 1009 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from near Country Club Estates to University Of Florida. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Gainesville, St. Marys, Kingsland, Brunswick, St. Simons Island, Fernandina Beach, Palatka, Orange Park, and Green Cove Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden
